title: Will these specs be good enough to run LoL on smoothly?
body:
Hey all

So i'm planning on buying a PC and i'm mainly going to play LoL on it.

Im not really good with PC specs so im just going to shove everything about the computer here. They are:

Thermaltake V4 Mid Tower Case USB3.0 - 500W PSU
Gigabyte 970A-D3P AM3+ ATX Motherboard 
AMD Piledriver FX-6300 AM3+ 3.5GHz Hexacore
GeIL 8GB Kit (2x4GB) DDR3 Evo Veloce C9 1600MHz
Asus Radeon R7 250 1GB GDDR5
Seagate Desktop SSHD ST1000DX001 3.5"1TBw/8GBFlash
Asus DRW-24D3ST 24x Black SATA DVD 
Microsoft Windows 8.1 OEM 64 Bi

All I want is the game to be able to run on about 70+ FPS.
The price of the rig is $910, and i've already worked what mouse, keyboard, monitor and I want.

Thanks in advance.

replies.body: Buy a decent toaster for $30 and throw a potato in it, works fine for me!
